Generation V.Black: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
Generation V.White: This extremely wise Pokémon excels at rescuing people stranded at sea or in the mountains.
Generation V.Black 2: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.
Generation V.White 2: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.

Generation VI.X: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
Generation VI.Y: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.

Generation VII.Sun: Intelligent, good-natured, and valiant, it's a trustworthy partner on rescue teams.
Generation VII.Moon: With this wise Pokémon, there could be no concern that it would ever attack people. Some parents even trust it to babysit.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It pays no mind to the cold, thanks to its long warm coat. Stoutland in Alola look a little uncomfortable.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its fur is long and thick. A long time ago in cold regions, every household kept a Stoutland.

Generation VIII.Sword: These Pokémon seem to enjoy living with humans. Even a Stoutland caught in the wild will warm up to people in about three days.
Generation VIII.Shield: Stoutland is immensely proud of its impressive moustache. It's said that moustache length is what determines social standing among this species.

Generation V.Black: Route 10 , Cold Storage , P2 Laboratory ( Rustling grass )
Generation V.White: Route 10 , Cold Storage , P2 Laboratory ( Rustling grass )
Generation V.Black 2: Routes 1 , 2 , and 3 , P2 Laboratory ( Rustling grass )
Generation V.White 2: Routes 1 , 2 , and 3 , P2 Laboratory ( Rustling grass )

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Training Lowlands ( Wanderer ) Fields of Honor ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )
